definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: The current through the resistor is several thousandths of an ampere.
sentences.chinese: 該電阻上的電流爲零點零零幾安培。

sentences.english: The electrolyser circuit is protected by a 30-amp circuit breaker.
sentences.chinese: 該電解槽的電路是被一個30安培的斷路器。

sentences.english: Connect the battery and ammeter to the starter as shown in the illustration.
sentences.chinese: 按說明連接電池和安培計到起動機上。

sentences.english: Make sure that the dc ammeter indication increases approximately 5 amperes.
sentences.chinese: 確保直流電流表指示升高大約5安培。

sentences.english: The guard terminal of the electrometer ammeter or picoammeter is the LO input terminal.
sentences.chinese: 靜電計安培計和皮安計的保護端爲LO輸入端。

sentences.english: Find also the equivalent resistance of the adapted meter.
sentences.chinese: 求改裝後的安培計的電阻。

sentences.english: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.chinese: 我還想要一個鋁製的安培表，雖然它與另一個類似。

sentences.english: The forward currents can be hundreds to thousands of amperes.
sentences.chinese: 而電流會有數百到數千安培。

sentences.english: When installing, arrange with amperage values as close to each other as available.
sentences.chinese: 在安裝過程中，儘可能的用接近其安培數的管。

sentences.english: I have consulted with the electrician about using an ampere meter, but I still do not get it.
sentences.chinese: 我還想要一個鋁製的安培表，雖然它與另一個類似。

sentences.english: His job is just to dispense ARV drugs from the local Empilisweni hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是在安培斯文尼當地的醫院分發抗病毒藥物。

sentences.english: The ideal ammeter should read zero when its input terminals are left open.
sentences.chinese: 當輸入端開路時，理想安培計的讀數應當爲零。

sentences.english: All the LEDs are connected in parallel with a 100-ohm resistor in series with each.
sentences.chinese: 在此方法中，恆壓源與未知電阻和安培計相串聯。

sentences.english: If other connections are available, the amperes will vary inversely with rated voltage.
sentences.chinese: 也可採用其它電壓，但安培值將與電壓值成反比關係。

sentences.english: Single Phase IOH PWM rated at 35 Ampere per Phase.
sentences.chinese: 單相脈寬調製IOH額定三五安培每階段。

sentences.english: Applying the concept of the solid angle , this paper generally demonstrates the Ampere circuit rule.
sentences.chinese: 本文應用立體角的概念，一般地證明了安培環路定理。

definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
Hertz (name)/Heinrich Hertz (1857-1894), German physicist and meteorologist, pioneer of electromagnetic radiation
